title: The Manager of Mayhem
description: You thrive in chaos and profit from it.

title: The Soft-Spoken Saviour
description: Empathy is your language. Order is your comfort.

title: The Startup Bro
description: Structure is your superpower. Hustle, your religion.

title: The Sensitive Absurdist
description: You cry at memes and rescue pigeons mid-call.

title: The Empathetic Rebel
description: You help others while breaking all the rules.

title: The Reluctant Villain
description: You break systems with a smirk—and a spreadsheet.

title: The Peaceful Fool
description: You believe in rules, even when they're surreal.

title: The Shrug Emoji
description: You're here, you're chill, and maybe mildly confused.
